attributes.action: Petition ! Show your National Insurance Card" to receive treatment on OUR NHS.
attributes.background: FOREIGN PEOPLE ARE USING BRITAIN'S NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE ! " BRITISH TAXPAYERS PAY MILLIONS OF £££,'s , & THIS MONEY COULD BE USED FOR GENUINE BRITISH INDIGENOUS PEOPLE WHO ARE IN NEED OF TREATMENT.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. The Government no longer sends out National Insurance number cards, so we're not sure how you would like this to work for people who don't already have a card. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182871
